org.anyframe.util.system
Class SystemInfoUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.anyframe.util.system.SystemUtilBase
      org.anyframe.util.system.SystemInfoUtil

public abstract class SystemInfoUtil
extends SystemUtilBase

System Info Utility Class
Provide functions that search memory, Cpu, process, OS information, and directory list information.

Author:
HyunJung Jeong, ByungHun Woo
